author: mmusich
body:
fixes https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/45106

#### PR description:

Title says it all, either remove or adapt a bunch of configuration fragments that currently don't compile

#### PR validation:

```bash
#!/bin/bash -ex

# Array of module paths
modules=(
    "DQM.EcalMonitorDbModule.EcalCondDBWriter_cfi"
    #"Geometry.ForwardCommonData.hfnoseV15ParametersInitialization_cfi" (removed, here)
    #"Geometry.HcalEventSetup.HcalTrigTowerGeometry_cfi" (removed, here)
    #"JetMETCorrections.TauJet.TCRecoTauDiscriminationAlgoComponent_cfi" (removed, here)
    "RecoMET.METPUSubtraction.mvaPFMET_leptons_cfi"
    #"RecoTauTag.RecoTau.PFRecoTauProducer_cfi" (removed https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/45191)
    #"RecoTracker.MkFit.mkFitHitConverter_cfi" (removed https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/45109)
    "L1Trigger.L1TCalorimeter.caloStage2Params_2016_v0p0_cfi"
    "DQM.SiStripMonitorClient.SiStripDQMRecoConfigOfflineGlobalRunCAF_cfi"
    "RecoParticleFlow.PFProducer.pfGsfElectronCiCSelector_cfi"
    "SimGeneral.MixingModule.mix_2015_25nsLowPU_matchData_PoissonOOTPU_cfi"
)

# Loop over the array and execute the python commands
for module in "${modules[@]}"; do
    echo "****************************************************************"
    python3 -m "$module"
done
echo "****************************************************************"
```

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

N/A
title: either remove or make a bunch of configuration fragments compile
